overview:
Michael is a co-founder and CTO of BigTwist, an emerging software company delivering a SaaS presentation solution.

Michael has had a career as a technologist spanning some 30 years. Prior to BigTwist, Michael has held various Technology Management positions, ncluding CTO of ThinkChain, and VP of Engineering at Entertainment Media Works, a Chief Architect at SixDegrees.com;

Michael has worked at Bell Laboratories, The T. J. Watson Research Center of IBM, The Courant Institute of Mathematical Sciences at NYU.

Michael earned a BM from the San Francisco Conservatory of Music and an MA from the University of California at Berkeley.
